website_summaries.verdict: Though it may be too large and cumbersome for the average consumer, it's a good choice for those who prefer to fry large birds, and versatile as a stockpot for other dishes.
pros: capacity, this model is capable of frying turkeys up to 25 lbs
Has a sturdy build throughout, with aluminum construction, riveted handles, and heavy-duty rack and hooks
cons: It's large and takes up more storage space than some of its competitors

customer_reviews.title: Really well made and handles the big turkeys with ease ...
customer_reviews.text: Really well made and handles the big turkeys with ease. Be careful with the estimated cooking times. When it says 65 minutes, it means 65 minutes from the time you drop the bird (or other food) in the pot. NOT 65 minutes from when the oil gets back up to temperature. The voice of experience talking.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Two major issues
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this turkey fryer, but unfortunately I have to leave it two stars. My two main issues are... 1. Whatever material it is made out of, sheds like crazy. I am guessing it is aluminum. But even after cleaning it out, and wiping it down twice, I'd still get blackish residue on the towels I was using to clean it. 2. The material on the bottom is incredibly thin. I can't imagine this lasting very long. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room for big birds
customer_reviews.text: I debated on getting the 30qt or 42qt and I'm glad I got the 42. I will be frying a turkey for Thanksgiving 20-24lbs don't know the weight yet until I pick it from whole foods. I did a test run with 2 whole chickens and peanut oil, they came out great. The pot and all the accessories I used when frying cleaned up very well with just soap and warm water. So far so good, I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: L.A. Harbor Area

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good, but it was much larger than I needed. Even with a 20 lb bird it took two jugs of oil (6 gal). That’s almost $60.
customer_reviews.author: marn

customer_reviews.title: Quality turkey fryer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of construction. Riveted handles are very sturdy, Heavy metal gauge is quite adequate for whatever will be asked of it. Room enough for any turkey. Only criticism is that thermometer is not very accurate. I just use one I happen to have.
customer_reviews.author: docjohn

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pot and accessories to deep fry a 25 to 30 lb turkey. It did it with ease. I test it out an 18lb turkey, and the 18lb turkey seemed too small for the pot (tongue in cheek). Although I have only used it two times, I will use it again for many other things. This pot and accessories exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I deep fried a 24 lb turkey in this sucker at Thanksgiving! I bought the suggested base for it. I wouldn’t want to try a bigger turkey in it. Took 6 gallons of peanut oil. Fried it to perfection!! Highly recommend! Make sure to watch safety videos on YouTube!
customer_reviews.author: JBAP

customer_reviews.title: Cooks a big F****** bird
customer_reviews.text: This things huge. Takes about 6.5-7 gallons to fry a 23lb bird. WIth no real max fill line like other bayou classic fryers i scored the inside when I did the test fill with water also keeping in mind that oil will expand when heated. Other than that its amazing! everythign it comes with is super helpful
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

customer_reviews.title: Grand Gobbler is Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Received it just in time for Thanksgiving. Nice kit and I am glad I purchased the 44 quart for large turkeys and cooking a large pot of crabs, yum. Nice complete kit with all the extras and instructions for my first time turkey frying.
customer_reviews.author: mary t. yates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and delivered as described.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a larger pot for frying turkeys. I typically fry 8-12 over Thanksgiving and Christmas season. Due to danger in frying turkeys larger than about 13-14 pounds in my 30qt pot and oil splash I had to fry more birds for large gatherings. With this 42qt pot my first fry was a 15 and a 16 # birds. Took a little over 4 gallons of oil but no splash. I would not fry a bird larger than 18# just to be safe. Pot is advertised for up to 25# and it looks like it would fix but not willing to take the added risk. All the added items was a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Looks greats
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used not knowing what condition it would be in when it showed up. It looks brand new with the wrapping still on it. Lots of handy extras like a hook, glove, thermometer, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ethne Damm

customer_reviews.title: Turkey.
customer_reviews.text: A little wide used about 7 gallons of peanut oil for a 21lb turkey but fried it well with this pot season it once done using it.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL M.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged. I bought it as a Father’s Day gift. For whatever reason my father waited just over 30 days to open it. When he opened it he found it was damaged. The outside of the box was in great condition. Looks as though it was damaged before it was shipped. Bummer. Guess I will need to receive the items before I send them as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the bigger bird!
customer_reviews.text: While it's hard to find a fryer to handle a turkey more than twenty pounds, this one handle a 25 pound bird without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Di B

customer_reviews.title: all great accept thermometer was broken
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderfully but the thermometer was broken. Was shipped timely and the pot worked fabulous if only the thermometer worked.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Big Pot and more Turkey, Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: Great pot for the bigger size needed and turkey’s came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great fryer
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge. I got it to replace my ancient one. Good quality for a deep fryer or boiling pot. Be prepared to use a lot of oil for this monster.
customer_reviews.author: Shreta Irving

customer_reviews.title: Full of holes after a year
customer_reviews.text: This pot was great for a year and a half and now it's full of pin holes. I've fried 4 turkeys and did 2 shrimp boils in it. The pot was cleaned and stored properly. This product doesnt last.
customer_reviews.author: brandon parrott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, easy to clean & use .1st time user of deep frying turkeys, very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little bit more oil but I’ll trade that over a skinnier Turkey pot with a bigger chance of fire any day
customer_reviews.author: Theplumbingdon

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Workerd perfectly with over 20lbs turkeys . Great quality .
customer_reviews.author: Eltronkko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for frying a large turkey.
customer_reviews.text: Frying a large turkey requires preparation, good equipment, and proper knowledge to perform safely. This 42 qt pot certainly fits the bill as good equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Was shocked to open this and see such a great heavy duty pot. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Damaged during shipment
customer_reviews.text: Item showed up completely dented and almost unusable. Fortunately we were able to shape the pot enough to be able to fry the turkey.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great for frying larger Turkeys
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been frying Turkeys for 30 years and this is a top of the line pot
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size. We fit a 27lb turkey in it. Only used 2 things of oil. Also love the mitt that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Jozwiak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 20 lbs turkey
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a 20 pounder! Shipped as stated no damage, sturdy will get years of use. Turkey frys to low country boils
customer_reviews.author: Robert Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Big bird fryer.
customer_reviews.text: This pot is the perfect size for what ever size turkey you want to fry. Comes with all you need .Great construction ,all the other pots I research thinner and smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for deep frying a turkey outside.. heats up quick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked good
customer_reviews.text: Didn't use. Look good, decided on the smaller 32 quart
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fryer
customer_reviews.text: Used for thanksgiving to fry a 20 pound turkey and worked perfect
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product! The fry mitt was awesome and really helped when lowering a turkey into the hot oil. The larger size was great and the oil never overflowed like it can with the 30 quart size.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Light

customer_reviews.title: Huge pot and perfect for big birds
customer_reviews.text: We fried a very large turkey...22 lbs and this was the perfect size. No problems with frying or the equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie J. Young

product_meta.title: Bayou Classic 4225 42Qt Alum Turkey Fryer, Units
product_meta.description: Size:UNITSFor 30 years Bayou Classic has been an industry innovator providing outdoor cooking equipment catering to events in every region & every season. Turkey frying season is approaching & Bayou Classic introduces the grand gobbler for frying large turkeys. The new Bayou Classic 42-qt grand gobbler is specifically designed to fry your larger Thanksgiving Turkey to 25 lb & features: 42-qt aluminum stockpot with lid & Riveted handles; patented poultry rack & lift hook; stainless 12" Fry thermometer; 2-oz. Seasoning Injector; protective Leather glove. Made of 99% pure aluminum, this 42-qt Turkey fryer features heavy duty riveted handles & a vented lid. Inside the pot is a patented poultry rack & lift hook designed to create a circular flow of oil up through & around the cavity during the frying process. The final result is cooking your Thanksgiving Turkey golden brown. The select-grain leather glove (right hand only) protects from hot oil as you lift the turkey, to slowly insert & later remove, from the pot. The stainless 12-in. Fry thermometer enables you to monitor & maintain optimal frying temperature. The 2 oz. Seasoning Injector with stainless needle is ideal for infusing your favorite seasonings into the turkey prior to cooking. Use outdoors only with your favorite Bayou Classic high Pressure cooker. Yes, even larger size turkeys to 35-lb can be fried in the grand gobbler, but legs & Wings must first be removed & Fried separately; otherwise, they will overcook. When doing this, fry the turkey body following the standard instructions for whole turkeys. Typically, legs & Wings require 18 Min to cook separately. Remove the rack & hook to use this versatile stockpot year round for cooking soup, shrimp, crabs, corn, peanuts, jambalaya, low Country boil or gumbo. The Bayou Classic Grand gobbler is your next must-have outdoor cooking equipment.
feature_bullets: The new 42-qt 'Grand gobbler' Turkey Fryer is specifically designed to Fry large turkeys up to 25-lb
42-Qt aluminum stockpot with lid and riveted handles
Patented poultry rack and lift hook

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars150 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
